alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 8:53AM CST until January 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow and dangerous travel conditions expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 8 inches expected, highest across western Lake county with much lower amounts near the lake. Wind gusts as high as 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates will exceed 1 inch per hour at times. The strongest winds will occur this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
